Step Up for Change

Explore donation, upcycling, and community sports initiatives that empower you to feel great while making a positive impact.

Looking for ways to make a difference in your community? 

Step up and discover a range of initiatives that not only help you feel good but also do good.
From donation programs to upcycling efforts and community sports projects, there’s something for everyone. 
Whether you’re clearing out old gear, volunteering your time, or joining a local club, every action counts toward creating a healthier, more connected community.

 
Tread Lightly

Tread Lightly is a nationwide recycling initiative turning unwanted sports and active lifestyle footwear into new opportunities—all right here in Australia.
Bringing together brands, retailers, suppliers, athletes, and customers, Tread Lightly empowers the Australian sporting community to shrink its environmental footprint. It’s never been easier to take meaningful action and tread lighter on the planet

 

 

The Athlete’s Foot

Turn your pre-loved sports shoes into something amazing! Drop them off at designated The Athlete’s Foot stores, where they’ll be collected and recycled into materials for new products like gym mats, flooring, and playgrounds.
Step up and join the movement to create a sustainable future—one pair of shoes at a time!

 

 

Rebel

Recycling and sport is a winning combination! Discover how this major sports brand is scoring big with its innovative recycling programs. From footwear to balls and bags, their nationwide initiatives are helping communities stay in the game sustainably.
Step up, donate your sporting gear, and make an impact today—because doing good feels as great as hitting a personal best!

 

 

JD Sports

A social responsibility to operate as environmentally conscious as possible, with a focus on waste reduction and recycling. They are proud to be partnering with ASGA on a global first initiative industry-wide footwear recycling program. The initiative works to reduce the significant volume of shoes which end up in landfill every year. To get involved, we encourage you to visit any Victorian JD store to donate your unwanted footwear. Working with our recycling partners, the reusable byproducts will be utilised to create gym matts, flooring, sporting surfaces and retail flooring.

 

 

Anaconda

Anaconda stores nationwide serve as collection points for pre-loved snow jackets, puffers, and fleece jumpers, which are distributed to the homeless through a network of up to 2,000 charities. Those without a pre-loved item can purchase a new jacket at Anaconda to donate. The Heat the Homeless appeal invites the community to donate quality jackets to those in need. If you'd give it to a friend, it's good enough to donate! Simply drop your jacket in an Anaconda store's donation box, and partner charities will ensure it reaches someone in need.

 

 

Platypus Shoes

Give your old kicks new life! You can now recycle your pre-loved kicks in select stores. This program is part of the Tread Lightly initiative by ASGA & Save our Sole. They’ll be picked up at our store and sent to a recycling plant with reusable components extracted including rubber, leather and fibres. The reclaimed materials are used to manufacture new products such as gym floors. Now available in selected Platypus stores.
